skills.name: nserc-discovery-grant
skills.description: Comprehensive skill for writing NSERC Discovery Grant applications grounded in the official Merit Indicators framework. Provides systematic coverage checks for the three evaluation criteria (Excellence of Researcher, Merit of Proposal, HQP Training), emphasizes cross-disciplinary writing for general audiences, and integrates Top 10 Tips from experienced reviewers.
triggers: Working with Application.md or LaTeX attachments
